categories: Toddler and child hats and toques
description:
This lightweight, quick drying cap was made for splishing and splashing. With its compact brim to shield tiny faces, the Baggies Cap is ready for kiddie poolside fun and pairs great with water wings. It packs down small and won’t look any worse for wear from being shoved into a beach bag.Recycled nylon wicks  moisture and dries quickly.DWR finish keeps it looking great between washes.Soft internal headband absorbs sweat and is treated with HeiQ® Fresh durable odor control.Adjustable hook-and-loop back strap.Fair Trade Certified™ sewn.

        Sustainability














                      Recycled content








Bluesign











                      Bluesign® Approved Material
name: Patagonia Baggies Cap - Infants to Children
